Interstellar.desc: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to save humanity.

The Dark Knight.desc: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind bringing Gotham City to chaos.

Blade Runner 2049.desc: A young blade runner discovers a secret that could unravel society.

Arrival.desc: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien visitors.

Mad Max: Fury Road.desc: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a drifter teams up with a rebel warrior to escape tyranny.

The Prestige.desc: Two rival magicians compete in a deadly battle of wits.

Shutter Island.desc: A U.S. Marshal investigates a mysterious disappearance at a remote mental institution.

Ex Machina.desc: A young programmer is selected to participate in a groundbreaking experiment in AI.

Gravity.desc: Two astronauts must work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.

Dune.desc: A young man must navigate political intrigue and an alien desert planet to fulfill his destiny.
